articles.description: Mercedes' George Russell pips Ferrari’s Carlos Sainz to pole position at the Las Vegas Grand Prix.
articles.title: Las Vegas Grand Prix: George Russell on pole with Max Verstappen fifth and Lando Norris sixth

articles.description: India's openers ensure they maintain their dominant position against Australia with an unbroken century stand on day two of the first Test in Perth.
articles.title: Australia v India: Yashasvi Jaiswal and KL Rahul put tourists in dominant position in first Test

articles.description: Pep Guardiola says he will stand by Manchester City even if they are relegated over alleged breaches of financial rules.
articles.title: Pep Guardiola promises to stay at Manchester City even if relegated

articles.description: England captain Harry Kane makes history by reaching 50 Bundesliga goals at the fastest pace ever with a hat-trick for Bayern Munich against Augsburg.
articles.title: Bayern Munich 3-0 Augsburg: Harry Kane quickest player to 50 Bundesliga goals after hat-trick

articles.description: Ruben Amorim says he is the 'right guy at the right time' to turn Manchester United around.
articles.title: Ruben Amorim: New Manchester United boss says he is the 'right guy' for the job

articles.description: Brydon Carse takes four wickets and Zak Crawley scores 94 on the first day of England's warm-up match for their three Tests in New Zealand.
articles.title: England in New Zealand: Brydon Carse and Zak Crawley impress in warm-up against PM XI

articles.description: Lando Norris says he will "do everything" possible to keep the F1 drivers’ championship alive in the Las Vegas Grand Prix.
articles.title: Las Vegas Grand Prix: Lando Norris 'has chance' to beat Max Verstappen in race

articles.description: Giannis Antetokounmpo records his second triple-double of the season as the Milwaukee Bucks beat the Indiana Pacers during Friday's NBA Cup games.
articles.title: NBA Cup: Giannis Antetokounmpo stars as Milwaukee Bucks win again

articles.description: Steven Finn explains why England need to lose their obsession with the Ashes to improve their chances of success in Australia next winter.
articles.title: Men's Ashes: Steven Finn on why England must stop obsessing about Australia

articles.description: World champions South Africa arrive in Cardiff to take on a Wales side facing the prospect of losing a 12th successive international.
articles.title: Wales v South Africa: Springboks aim to pile misery on Warren Gatland
